title: Find Owner of a Found Item
description: A wallet is found with an ID inside. A guest services agent needs to attempt to contact the owner.

tasks.description: Log the found wallet in the lost and found database, including the name on the ID.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent creates a new found item record.

tasks.description: Search the ticketing system's order history for a guest with the matching name who attended the event.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent finds a ticket order with a matching name and retrieves the guest's contact information (email and phone number).

tasks.description: Contact the guest via phone or email to inform them their wallet has been found.
Arrange a time for the guest to come to the venue to pick up the wallet.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent schedules a pickup time and provides instructions.
